SELECT tpa.*,tft.ID V_FILEID,tac.V_ALI_MONEY,tac.V_WX_MONEY,tsub.USER_NAME, ifnull(tac.V_TOTAL_MONEY,0) V_TOTAL_MONEY,tac.V_PAY_NUM,tft.V_NAME FILE_NAME FROM t_pay_account tpa left join t_account_collection tac on tpa.ID = tac.V_ACCOUNT_ID left join t_sys_user_base tsub on tpa.V_CREATE_USER = tsub.USER_ID left join t_file_tab tft on tpa.V_FILE_ID = tft.ID
AND tpa.V_CREATE_USER = #{USER_ID}
AND tsub.USER_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{USER_NAME}, '%')
AND tpa.V_PAY_MODEL like CONCAT('%', #{V_PAY_MODEL}, '%')
